## co-occurrence

co-occurrences with enviro + labor keywords in enviro-labor speeches

```{r enviroLabor co-occurrence keywords}

enviroVocab <- c("^environ",
                 "^ecolog",
                 "^ecosyst",
                 "^pollut",
                 "^wildlif",
                 "^wilder") 


laborVocab <- c("^labor$",
                "^worker$",
                "^job$",
                "^wage$") 

enviroLaborVocab <- c(enviroVocab,laborVocab) %>%
  as_tibble()

enviroLaborVocab

```
